label: Market Trend Timeline
description: Explore market trend signals over time for selected industries, categories, benchmarks, and regions.

defaultOutputs.name: Trend ID
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Unique identifier for each detected market trend.

defaultOutputs.name: Trend Name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Human-readable name or label for the market trend.

defaultOutputs.name: Yearly Signal
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Array capturing the trend signal per year within the selected time horizon (e.g. interest, volume, score).

defaultOutputs.name: Evaluation
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Summary evaluation of the trend (e.g. Emerging, Growing, Mature, Declining) based on yearly signals and benchmarks.

configSchema.label: Industry
configSchema.tooltip: Choose the primary industry lens for the trend analysis.

configSchema.label: Category
configSchema.tooltip: When **Consumer Health** is selected, choose one of its categories.

configSchema.label: From Year
configSchema.tooltip: Start of the time horizon for the trend timeline (inclusive).

configSchema.label: To Year

configSchema.label: Region (Optional)
